
---
title: '炫光联动性能强，DIY 装机好选择，技嘉 AORUS 电竞全家桶推荐'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 分类资讯
headimg: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/45bee368-40ed-4ffc-8c43-cf9f9726098c.jpeg'
author: IT 之家
comments: false
date: Tue, 12 Jul 2022 01:33:14 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/45bee368-40ed-4ffc-8c43-cf9f9726098c.jpeg'
---

<div>   
<p data-vmark="80b4">对于想要 DIY 一台台式机的消费者们来说，在同一家店内购买同一品牌的配件然后自行组装会是一个不错的选择。这样既可以享受比品牌整机更低廉的价格，还能享受更好的售后服务。而技嘉 AORUS 全家桶就很适合热爱游戏的电竞玩家们了。笔者搭配了一套比较均衡的配置，供大家参考：</p><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="f617"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/45bee368-40ed-4ffc-8c43-cf9f9726098c.jpeg" w="1268" h="684" alt title="炫光联动性能强，DIY 装机好选择，技嘉 AORUS 电竞全家桶推荐" width="1268" height="442" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="683c">首先给大家介绍一下最核心的显卡和 CPU。显卡我们选择了技嘉魔鹰 GeForce RTX 3060 Ti GAMING OC 8G。RTX 3060Ti 是中高端显卡中最具性价比的一款了。而其中魔鹰的做工和用料都很出色。它采用 11 扇叶刀刃式风扇 + 进气格栅散热设计，散热能力出众，同时 RGB FUSION 2.0 功能的支持也让它可以和技嘉全家桶的硬件闪耀联动，是显卡中的好选择。</p><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="03b7"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/b4f2d0f9-f5a2-457c-ad17-54fb916f927e.jpeg" w="1269" h="864" alt title="炫光联动性能强，DIY 装机好选择，技嘉 AORUS 电竞全家桶推荐" width="1269" height="558" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><dir><a contenteditable="false" href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-hosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=%2fpages%2funion%2fproxy%2fproxy%3fspreadUrl%3dhttps%253a%252f%252funion-click.jd.com%252fjdc%253fe%253d%2526p%%26EA_PTAG%3d17078.27.380" data-jdid="100024498924"><span class="card main-site"><span class="card-logo"><img src="https://img14.360buyimg.com/pop/jfs/t1/167926/17/25891/550696/6214bde2E6db1f3b4/e859ba05aa866b06.jpg" title="炫光联动性能强，DIY 装机好选择，技嘉 AORUS 电竞全家桶推荐" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></span><span class="card-info"><span class="card-title"><span class="mall-data">京东</span><span class="card-name">技嘉魔鹰 GeForce RTX 3060 Ti GAMING OC 8G LHR 电竞游戏设计智能学习电脑独立显卡</span></span><span class="card-abstract"></span><span class="card-controls"><span class="price"> 3699 元</span><span class="card-btn-deep">直达链接</span></span></span></span></a></dir><p data-vmark="eb1b">搭配的 CPU 笔者选择了 i5-12600KF，这是最便宜的支持 12 代混合异构的 Intel 处理器了，性能相当出色，用来搭配 RTX 3060Ti 正合适。</p><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="2e60"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/e0befcb2-8584-4cce-a564-d04902eb2a7d.jpeg" w="1263" h="842" alt title="炫光联动性能强，DIY 装机好选择，技嘉 AORUS 电竞全家桶推荐" width="1263" height="547" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="7164">强劲的处理器需要稳定的供电，而技嘉雪雕 B660M AORUS PRO AX DDR4 采用 12+1+1 相供电设计，其中处理器核心部分提供 60A Dr MOS 供电，即便是 i9 级别的处理器也能够承载。IO 面板区域则采用全覆盖散热片设计，配合高品质导热垫可以快速地带走主板核心区域产生的热量。2 盎司铜电路板带来更好的电气性能和电力保障，通过铜快速导热特点，帮助主板进行高效散热。银白色的金属散热装甲也是非常炫酷。</p><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="3499"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/45b7e2a5-9de9-4f9f-bcc9-bf1dcc78ebe6.jpeg" w="1260" h="841" alt title="炫光联动性能强，DIY 装机好选择，技嘉 AORUS 电竞全家桶推荐" width="1260" height="547" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><dir><a contenteditable="false" href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAOEJK1olXwcKXV5VAEkWA18IGloQXwEGVlZZD0kTBl9MRANLAjZbERscSkAJHTdNTwcKBlMdBgABFksWAmoKHF8XVQIFVlpYFxJSXzI4RTlKLnB9UVg-CBd1C2tqSCBHBGMDNFJROE4WCmcBHloUWTYBVllfDk8SAGg4eDx7AEdcKQAFc0InA2o4WjUSXwEHUm5dC0wTAWoAGlMdbQYFUFhZAUMSAmYIH1wlXQ4FZAIfWgpVM184GGslbQYyV24DZkpEA2wMEllAM1sGDQcUVgNHbWYIGlwTXg8FZFxcCUkVM18" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAOEJK1olXwcKXV5VAEkWA18IGloQXwEGVlZZD0kTBl9MRANLAjZbERscSkAJHTdNTwcKBlMdBgABFksWAmoKHF8XVQIFVlpYFxJSXzI4aVpNJUJAEho-eDlxcDtQTQdmG2dkElJROEgQCmYOK1gXWgQEUFteD3t0ZAFVWgVoA155XW5fCU4WAmc4WjUSXwEHUm5dDE4SCm4IE1wTbQYFUFhZAUMSAmYLGF4lXQ4FZAIfWgpVM184GGslbQYyV24DZkpEA29dGFkRM1sGDQcUSUoRbWYIHFkRXgEBZFxcCUkVM18" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-hosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAOEJK1olXwcKXV5VAEkWA18IGloQXwEGVlZZD0kTBl9MRANLAjZbERscSkAJHTdNTwcKBlMdBgABFksWAmoKHF8XVQIFVlpYFxJSXzI4awRIJ3t2PUA_WDVUfQRUbShFDXJ5NFJROEkWA2oBG1odVDYBVllfDk8SAGg4eDx7AEdcKQAFc0InA244WjUSXwEHUm5fCUoVC2gNGFgTbQYFUFhZAUMSAmYNHlwlXQ4FZAIfWgpVM184GGslbQYyV24DZkpEA29fHgtAM1sGDQcUSUwebWYIGl0RXwIBZFxcCUkVM18" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=%2fpages%2funion%2fproxy%2fproxy%3fspreadUrl%3dhttps%253a%252f%252funion-click.jd.com%252fjdc%253fe%253d%2526p%253dJF8BAOEJK1olXwcKXV5VAEkWA18IGloQXwEGVlZZD0kTBl9MRANLAjZbERscSkAJHTdNTwcKBlMdBgABFksWAmoKHF8XVQIFVlpYFxJSXzI4XD10FQ9DCgw_XTV0UW9LeC9oPUB0AlJROE4WCmcBHloUWTYBVllfDk8SAGg4eDx7AEdcKQAFc0InA2o4WjUSXwEHUm5dC0oVBW8PG1MdbQYFUFhZAUMSAmYMElwlXQ4FZAIfWgpVM184GGslbQYyV24DZkpEA29aTFNGM1sGDQcUSRsSbWYIHF4QXAYKZFxcCUkVM18%26EA_PTAG%3d17078.27.380" data-jdid="10043653956354"><span class="card main-site"><span class="card-logo"><img src="https://img14.360buyimg.com/pop/jfs/t1/116696/3/24840/147320/62b9294eE78aba115/1e9f4b79cac0a4b5.jpg" title="炫光联动性能强，DIY 装机好选择，技嘉 AORUS 电竞全家桶推荐" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></span><span class="card-info"><span class="card-title"><span class="mall-data">京东</span><span class="card-name">技嘉（GIGABYTE） 技嘉 B660M 小雕 / 雪雕 + 12 代英特尔 电竞游戏主板 CPU 套装 B660M AORUS PRO AX DDR4 雪雕 i5 12600KF</span></span><span class="card-abstract"></span><span class="card-controls"><span class="price">2607 元</span><span class="card-btn-deep">直达链接</span></span></span></span></a></dir><p data-vmark="f506">为了压制 i5-12600KF 的热量，我们需要一款出色的散热器。笔者这里选择了水雕 PRO 240 一体式水冷。水雕 PRO 240 采用的双 120mm ARGB 风扇，转速在 800～2500RPM 之间，轴承采用纳米石墨烯油轴承，最大风量达到 60.07CFM，最大风压达到 3.14mmH2O，使用寿命长达 73500 小时，纳米石墨烯润滑油可以带来更加安静耐用的体验。新一代设计的高性能水泵更加有效地排出 CPU 产生的废热。最有个性的地方在于，它的冷头处有一块圆形的 OLED 屏幕，通过 RGB Fusion 2.0 软件也可以自定义风扇灯光，并与其他 RGB 设备实现神光同步。</p><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="89d6"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/bd072edb-51c7-446e-98a0-32a3b4ba8925.png" w="1440" h="741" alt title="炫光联动性能强，DIY 装机好选择，技嘉 AORUS 电竞全家桶推荐" width="1440" height="422" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><dir><a contenteditable="false" href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAOUJK1olXQ8EUV1VDU4WAF8IGloQXwcAU1lZAUoRBl9MRANLAjZbERscSkAJHTdNTwcKBlMdBgABFksWAmoKGlkSWgILVVhYFxJSXzI4QTxUG1lgCzY_aANEe2tQTxMWNAZqAlJROEgWAWsJGlgUXQEyV1xaCk0TBmwPKzhyM1tDCiMDUDAeM28NKxp7XQcBVFdZCkonA2wPH1kQVQcKXG5dD08RB2YAHlwQVQYEZF5VD3tLQT1JWWslbQUyZG5dOEgnXQEJSFwQVQcLXDAADBJOSylLGTUTXwUHVVxbCXsVAm4KGWsl" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAOQJK1olXQ8EUV1VDU4WAF8IGloQXwcAU1lZAUoRBl9MRANLAjZbERscSkAJHTdNTwcKBlMdBgABFksWAmoKGlkSWgILVVhYFxJSXzI4ZSBLWQVcVjY_UilcY2l4ZzlvBGdcJFJROE4WCmcBHloUWTYBVllfDk8SAGg4eDx7AEdcKQAFc0InA2o4WjUVXAUCXVpfCXsXB2oNEloVVQEEZF5aDE0TCmcNHF4dWgIyVFZaOBdVUS5KK2slXjYyZF5tC3tJbW5bHVkVXg8AOgNZURJfRS1cdV0XXAEDV1dcOEkWAm0KK2s" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAOQJK1olXQ8EUV1VDU4WAF8IGloQXwcAU1lZAUoRBl9MRANLAjZbERscSkAJHTdNTwcKBlMdBgABFksWAmoKGlkSWgILVVhYFxJSXzI4ZlNLNFN0Dyg_UBceag9ObyscJwYBNFJROEwVAWwJGFgQXTYBVllfDk8SAGg4eDx7AEdcKQAFc0InA244WjUVXAUCXVpfCXsUAm0IGloUWA8FZF5aDE0TCmcNHF8UXgIyVFZaOBdVUS5KK2slXjYyZF5tC3tJbW5bHF4cXQcAOgNZURJfRSsNdV0XXg4GUV9cOEkWAm0KK2s" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-hosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAOQJK1olXQ8EUV1VDU4WAF8IGloQXwcAU1lZAUoRBl9MRANLAjZbERscSkAJHTdNTwcKBlMdBgABFksWAmoKGlkSWgILVVhYFxJSXzI4Twx8PmUEMiU_YVFoCzBwZFIRKXkEElJROEkWA2oBG1odVDYBVllfDk8SAGg4eDx7AEdcKQAFc0InA244WjUVXAUCXVpfCXsVAm4KE1wQXgUEZF5aDE0TCmcNHF8VWAEyVFZaOBdVUS5KK2slXjYyZF5tC3tJbW5bHVkVWAEBOgNZURJfRSZfdV0XXAAKVVpaOEkWAm0KK2s" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=%2fpages%2funion%2fproxy%2fproxy%3fspreadUrl%3dhttps%253a%252f%252funion-click.jd.com%252fjdc%253fe%253d%2526p%%26EA_PTAG%3d17078.27.380" data-jdid="10043036658074"><span class="card main-site"><span class="card-logo"><img src="https://img14.360buyimg.com/pop/jfs/t1/206865/38/14544/118126/61ce69caEe661dbe5/ee3559540ba25e9a.jpg" title="炫光联动性能强，DIY 装机好选择，技嘉 AORUS 电竞全家桶推荐" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></span><span class="card-info"><span class="card-title"><span class="mall-data">京东</span><span class="card-name">技嘉（GIGABYTE）AORUS CPU 水冷散热器 支持多平台 RGB 台式机电脑 英特尔 12 代 CPU 水雕 PRO 240 + 幽灵 C101G【热门推荐】</span></span><span class="card-abstract"></span><span class="card-controls"><span class="price">1599 元</span><span class="card-btn-deep">直达链接</span></span></span></span></a></dir><p data-vmark="c94a">内存方面，我们则选择了 2 根技嘉 AORUS DDR4 3733MHz 8G 内存条，组成 16G 双通道。AORUS MEMORY 内存采用优质颗粒，因此可以提供 3733 的高频率和 18-22-22-42 的低时序。带有 RGB 发光模块的散热马甲为内存提供了长时间稳定运作的环境。此外这个光效也支持 RGB FUSION 2.0 同步，是搭配技嘉主板的好选择。</p><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="0354"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/d49aeb83-8df6-4a12-803b-62d5fd489d5f.jpeg" w="1265" h="588" alt title="炫光联动性能强，DIY 装机好选择，技嘉 AORUS 电竞全家桶推荐" width="1265" height="381" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="971d">搭配技嘉 AORUS 主板，通过在 BIOS 中启用 "AORUS Memory Boost"，用户可以轻松提高内存读写性能。</p><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="219d"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/f3cb4d6c-870b-4a33-9dab-e9b90f0a28ce.png" w="755" h="288" alt title="炫光联动性能强，DIY 装机好选择，技嘉 AORUS 电竞全家桶推荐" width="755" height="288" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><dir><a contenteditable="false" href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-hosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAN4JK1olXg8DUl1ZC0geAl8PElISWAMCUF5bAXtTXDdWRGtMGENDFlVDFhNSVzMXQA4KD1heSllUAUwSBm8MG10cQl9HCANtbghSdwhQaDl2BXR_LQErYC5IGRxBTVcZbQQDVFtUCEofCl8LGVwXWwIHV1ltayx5Xi5WZgVNJg8yVF9tSSUXAm0PGFMTXTYAVV9fAEwSAGwOK1sSWQAGXVZYAUgVBWw4G1MSbVpABh8fOHsnAF84K1slXjZcOl8OD04QAz1cdQYRBF9JBFgdZk0VCmkIGl4UbQQDVVxfOHs" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=%2fpages%2funion%2fproxy%2fproxy%3fspreadUrl%3dhttps%253a%252f%252funion-click.jd.com%252fjdc%253fe%253d%2526p%%26EA_PTAG%3d17078.27.380" data-jdid="68864415178"><span class="card main-site"><span class="card-logo"><img src="https://img14.360buyimg.com/pop/jfs/t1/66557/30/19272/726695/6296de46E9cd9ba31/a5d6adc4be90dc49.png" title="炫光联动性能强，DIY 装机好选择，技嘉 AORUS 电竞全家桶推荐" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></span><span class="card-info"><span class="card-title"><span class="mall-data">京东</span><span class="card-name"> AORUS 技嘉  DDR4 2666/3200/3600/4400 8G / 16GB 台式机 RGB 内存条 AORUS 16GB 3733 (8Gx2)</span></span><span class="card-abstract"></span><span class="card-controls"><span class="price">629 元</span><span class="card-btn-deep">直达链接</span></span></span></span></a></dir><p data-vmark="3f32">硬盘也是影响电脑使用体验的重要一环。这里推荐一款高性价比的中端硬盘：技嘉 512GB 猛盘。猛盘严选主控与 NAND 闪存，提供优秀的读写性能（1700MB / S）以及 5 年保修或 800TBW 有限保修。猛盘支持主机内存缓冲区功能，HMB 大大提升使用体验与寿命，是替代 SATA 硬盘升级的好选择。</p><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="68df"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/23b66c3a-83fe-4dda-b62c-aa4495828ca6.jpeg" w="593" h="436" alt title="炫光联动性能强，DIY 装机好选择，技嘉 AORUS 电竞全家桶推荐" width="593" height="436" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><dir><a contenteditable="false" href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-hosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=%2fpages%2funion%2fproxy%2fproxy%3fspreadUrl%3dhttps%253a%252f%252funion-click.jd.com%252fjdc%253fe%253d%2526p%%26EA_PTAG%3d17078.27.380" data-jdid="100008719703"><span class="card main-site"><span class="card-logo"><img src="https://img14.360buyimg.com/pop/jfs/t1/124821/9/21389/571882/61e0eeeeE37578016/5064c4d83b83c641.jpg" title="炫光联动性能强，DIY 装机好选择，技嘉 AORUS 电竞全家桶推荐" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></span><span class="card-info"><span class="card-title"><span class="mall-data">京东</span><span class="card-name">技嘉（GIGABYTE) 512GB SSD 固态硬盘猛盘 M.2 接口 NVME 系列</span></span><span class="card-abstract"></span><span class="card-controls"><span class="price"> 379 元</span><span class="card-btn-deep">直达链接</span></span></span></span></a></dir><p data-vmark="5aec">以上就是这套电脑的核心配置了，整体来说都是中高端的。想要驱动这么一台电脑的话，需要一个强悍的心脏。这里笔者选择了技嘉斗战 650（P650B）电源。它通过了 80PLUS 铜牌认证，转换效率可达 89%（230V 典型负载）。内部使用全日系电容，搭配双直流驱动模块设计，寿命更长输出更稳定，还通过 10 项安规认证，第一年换新，后两年包换，使用起来很省心，性价比更是突出。</p><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="67c4"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/d41c32ca-88b6-469b-8b6a-fe15f6e2a8a8.jpeg" w="800" h="800" alt title="炫光联动性能强，DIY 装机好选择，技嘉 AORUS 电竞全家桶推荐" width="800" height="800" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><dir><a contenteditable="false" href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-hosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=%2fpages%2funion%2fproxy%2fproxy%3fspreadUrl%3dhttps%253a%252f%252funion-click.jd.com%252fjdc%253fe%253d%2526p%%26EA_PTAG%3d17078.27.380" data-jdid="55331741607"><span class="card main-site"><span class="card-logo"><img src="https://img14.360buyimg.com/pop/jfs/t1/53189/23/19649/249176/62ca5357Eb2321d13/8910d0b0f13bc544.jpg" title="炫光联动性能强，DIY 装机好选择，技嘉 AORUS 电竞全家桶推荐" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></span><span class="card-info"><span class="card-title"><span class="mall-data">京东</span><span class="card-name">技嘉（GIGABYTE）台式电脑主机电源额定宽幅 80PLUS 铜牌主动式 PFC P650B 额定 650W</span></span><span class="card-abstract"></span><span class="card-controls"><span class="price">369 元</span><span class="card-btn-deep">直达链接</span></span></span></span></a></dir><p data-vmark="e2b1">有这样一套 RGB 好配置，没有好看的机箱搭配怎么行呢。这里推荐一款大侧透的中塔机箱 —— 幽灵 C101G。幽灵 C101G 整个侧面都采用整块钢化玻璃面板熏黑，大大提升了提升整体质感，同时可以为内部的 RGB 设备抹上滤镜层次。内部空间也是绰绰有余，同时配备了 4 个 2.5 硬盘位和 2 个 3.5 硬盘位，兼容 240/360 水冷，扩展简单。正面采用快拆式防尘滤网设计，有效隔绝灰尘且方便清洁，是一款不错的中塔式机箱。</p><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="f504"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/321a3828-a387-4c36-83e5-4ad886c3c2b2.jpeg" w="800" h="800" alt title="炫光联动性能强，DIY 装机好选择，技嘉 AORUS 电竞全家桶推荐" width="800" height="800" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><dir><a contenteditable="false" href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAOQJK1olXQ8EUV1VDU4WAF8IGloQXwcAU1lZAUoRBl9MRANLAjZbERscSkAJHTdNTwcKBlMdBgABFksWAmoKGlkSWgILVVhYFxJSXzI4UBplIn9kXAM-TjlVAz9pbiRVW3lKJFJROE8UBm4KE1odVDYBVllfDk8SAGg4eDx7AEdcKQAFc0InA2o4WjUVXAUCXVpfCXsXAGgMGV4dXA4KZF5aDE0TCmcMG1kdXwcyVFZaOBdVUS5KK2slXjYyZF5tC3tJbW5bG1gQD1JVOgNZURJcSzVedVIVXAIEXF9ZOEkWAm0KK2s" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAOQJK1olXQ8EUV1VDU4WAF8IGloQXwcAU1lZAUoRBl9MRANLAjZbERscSkAJHTdNTwcKBlMdBgABFksWAmoKGlkSWgILVVhYFxJSXzI4fx9mK1FFDCI-VA8eRC5RexxsAAVJAlJROEgQCmYPK1gXWgQEUFteD3t0ZAFVWgVoA155XW5fCU4WAmc4WjUVXAUCXVpfCXsXAGgMGVoQWwAGZF5aDE0TCmcMG14WWgMyVFZaOBdVUS5KK2slXjYyZF5tC3tJbW5bG1tFWwNVOgNZURJcSypKdVIVWgMDXFpeOEkWAm0KK2s" data-jdid="10043036658074"><span class="card main-site"><span class="card-logo"><img src="https://img14.360buyimg.com/pop/jfs/t1/206865/38/14544/118126/61ce69caEe661dbe5/ee3559540ba25e9a.jpg" title="炫光联动性能强，DIY 装机好选择，技嘉 AORUS 电竞全家桶推荐" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></span><span class="card-info"><span class="card-title"><span class="mall-data">京东</span><span class="card-name">技嘉（GIGABYTE）AORUS CPU 水冷散热器 支持多平台 RGB 台式机电脑 英特尔 12 代 CPU 水雕 PRO 240 + 幽灵 C101G【热门推荐】</span></span><span class="card-abstract"></span><span class="card-controls"><span class="price">1599 元</span><span class="card-btn-deep">直达链接</span></span></span></span></a></dir><p data-vmark="eda2">上面这套配置完全可以在 2K 分辨率下高帧数畅玩 3A 大作了。所以笔者推荐大家搭配一台支持 2K 高刷新率的电竞显示器。比如技嘉 G32QC A。这是一台 31.5 英寸的大屏曲面显示器，原生 1500R 曲率、分辨率达到了 2569*1440，支持 165Hz 高刷，同时还提供了黑平衡、压枪辅助等竞技辅助功能，后期还可以通过技嘉“易升级”系统随时获取新功能，是这套电脑配置的好选择。</p><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="10a3"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/d2175f02-a344-4d76-8c34-b26b69cf1e0c.jpeg" w="800" h="800" alt title="炫光联动性能强，DIY 装机好选择，技嘉 AORUS 电竞全家桶推荐" width="800" height="800" 165HZ 台式机桌面电竞游戏曲面显示器 G32QC A</span></span><span class="card-abstract"></span><span class="card-controls"><span class="price">2799 元</span><span class="card-btn-deep">直达链接</span></span></span></span></a></dir><p data-vmark="1d02">以上就是笔者为大家准备的一套技嘉全家桶电竞套装了，这套配置兼顾了性能和颜值，<span class="accentTextColor">可以通吃市面上所有的大型游戏</span>，也能兼顾一些创意生产的需求，是一套进退两全、升级便捷的好配置，感兴趣的话可以去京东 / 天猫的技嘉官方店选购。</p>
